remarks.para: May be inoperative provided approach minimums do not require their use.

numlitem.para: For Category 1 manually flown lLS approaches, the Captain’s flight director display or approach coupler must be operative at the time of flight release if a combination of weather reports and forecast indicates the weather at the destination airport will be below 3/4 mile visibility or RVR 4000 at the estimated time of arrival.

For Category 1 manually flown lLS approaches, both flight director displays may be inoperative provided a combination of weather reports and forecasts indicates the weather at the destination airport will be at or above 3/4 mile visibility or RVR 4000 at the estimated time of arrival.
For autopilot coupled approaches to Category 1 minima, one flight director display must be operative.
For flight operations not intending an lLS approach, all flight director systems may be inoperative.
Downgrade aircraft category dispatch status to CAT 1.

placard.para: Placard near Left or Right ADI "FLIGHT DIRECTOR INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
